comments:
Build: I20070501-0010

1) Take sleak snapshot
2) Select "New Working Set" from the left-most working set toolbar drop down menu (the one with the + on it)
3) In the dialog, select "Plug-ins and Fragments", and click next
4) Hit cancel

-> One image is leaked each time these steps are repeated.
